00049 /*---- Port definitions ----*/
00050 
00051 sbit RELAIS0  = P3 ^ 0;
00052 sbit RELAIS1  = P3 ^ 1;
00053 sbit RELAIS2  = P3 ^ 2;
00054 sbit RELAIS3  = P3 ^ 3;
00055 
00056 sbit DOUT0    = P3 ^ 7;
00057 sbit DOUT1    = P3 ^ 6;
00058 sbit DOUT2    = P3 ^ 5;
00059 sbit DOUT3    = P3 ^ 4;
00060 
00061 sbit SRCLK    = P1 ^ 7;
00062 sbit SRIN     = P1 ^ 6;
00063 sbit SRSTROBE = P1 ^ 5;
00064 
00065 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00066 
00067 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00068 
00069 struct {
00070    unsigned char relais[4];
00071    unsigned char dout[4];
00072    float dac[2];
00073    unsigned char din[4];
00074    float adc[8];
00075    float dofs[2];
00076    float aofs[8];
00077 
00078    float rem_adc, rem_dac;
00079 } xdata user_data;

00137 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00138 
00139 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00140 
00141 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00142 {
00143    unsigned char i;
00144 
00145    led_mode(2, 0);              // buzzer off by default
00146 
00147    SFRPAGE = ADC0_PAGE;
00148    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00149    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00150    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC 
00151    REF0CN = 0x00;               // use external voltage reference
00152 
00153    SFRPAGE = LEGACY_PAGE;
00154    REF0CN = 0x02;               // select external voltage reference
00155 
00156    SFRPAGE = DAC0_PAGE;
00157    DAC0CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC0
00158    SFRPAGE = DAC1_PAGE;
00159    DAC1CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC1
00160 
00161    /* open drain(*) /push-pull: 
00162       P0.0 TX1      P1.0 TP6          P2.0 LED1         P3.0 RELAIS0
00163       P0.1*RX1      P1.1 BACKLIGHT    P2.1 LCD_E        P3.1 RELAIS1
00164       P0.2 TX2      P1.2 TP5          P2.2 LCD_RW       P3.2 RELAIS2
00165       P0.3*RX2      P1.3 TP7          P2.3 LCD_RS       P3.3 RELAIS3
00166                                                                       
00167       P0.4 EN1      P1.4 WATCHDOG     P2.4 LCD_DB4      P3.4 DOUT0
00168       P0.5 EN2      P1.5 SRSTROBE     P2.5 LCD_DB5      P3.5 DOUT1
00169       P0.6 LED2     P1.6*SRIN         P2.6 LCD_DB6      P3.6 DOUT2
00170       P0.7 BUZZER   P1.7 SRCLK        P2.7 LCD_DB7      P3.7 DOUT3
00171     */
00172    SFRPAGE = CONFIG_PAGE;
00173    P0MDOUT = 0xF5;
00174    P1MDOUT = 0xBF;
00175    P2MDOUT = 0xFF;
00176    P3MDOUT = 0xFF;
00177 
00178    /* initial EEPROM value */
00179    if (init) {
00180       for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++)
00181          user_data.relais[i] = 0;
00182 
00183       for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++)
00184          user_data.dout[i] = 0;
00185 
00186       user_data.dac[0] = 0;
00187       user_data.dac[1] = 0;
00188 
00189       for (i=0 ; i<8 ; i++)
00190          user_data.aofs[i] = 0;
00191    }
00192 
00193    /* write digital outputs */
00194    for (i=0 ; i<8 ; i++)
00195       user_write(i);
00196 
00197    /* write DACs */
00198    user_write(8);
00199    user_write(9);
00200 
00201    /* display startup screen */
00202    lcd_goto(0, 0);
00203    for (i=0 ; i<7-strlen(sys_info.node_name)/2 ; i++)
00204       puts(" ");
00205    puts("** ");
00206    puts(sys_info.node_name);
00207    puts(" **");
00208    lcd_goto(0, 1);
00209    printf("   Address:  %04X ", sys_info.node_addr);
00210 }
00211 
00212 #pragma NOAREGS
00213 
00214 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00215 
00216 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00217 {
00218    unsigned short d;
00219 
00220    switch (index) {
00221 
00222    case 0: RELAIS0 = user_data.relais[0]; break;
00223    case 1: RELAIS1 = user_data.relais[1]; break;
00224    case 2: RELAIS2 = user_data.relais[2]; break;
00225    case 3: RELAIS3 = user_data.relais[3]; break;
00226 
00227    case 4: DOUT0 = user_data.dout[0]; break;
00228    case 5: DOUT1 = user_data.dout[1]; break;
00229    case 6: DOUT2 = user_data.dout[2]; break;
00230    case 7: DOUT3 = user_data.dout[3]; break;
00231 
00232    case 8:                     // DAC0
00233    case 22:                    // DOFS0
00234       /* assume -10V..+10V range */
00235       d = ((user_data.dac[0] + user_data.dofs[0] + 10) / 20) * 0x1000;
00236       if (d >= 0x1000)
00237          d = 0x0FFF;
00238 
00239       SFRPAGE = DAC0_PAGE;
00240       DAC0L = d & 0xFF;
00241       DAC0H = d >> 8;
00242       break;
00243 
00244    case 9:                     // DAC1
00245    case 23:                    // DOFS1
00246       /* assume -10V..+10V range */
00247       d = ((user_data.dac[1] + user_data.dofs[1] + 10) / 20) * 0x1000;
00248       if (d >= 0x1000)
00249          d = 0x0FFF;
00250 
00251       SFRPAGE = DAC1_PAGE;
00252       DAC1L = d & 0xFF;
00253       DAC1H = d >> 8;
00254       break;
00255    }
00256 }

00263    return 0;

00266 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00267 
00268 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00269 {
00270    /* echo input data */
00271    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00272    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00273    return 2;
00274 }
00275 
00276 /*---- ADC read function -------------------------------------------*/
00277 
00278 void adc_read(channel, float *d)
00279 {
00280    unsigned long value;
00281    unsigned int i, n;
00282    float gvalue;
00283 
00284    SFRPAGE = ADC0_PAGE;
00285    AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00286    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00287 
00288    n = 1 << 10;                 // average 1024 times
00289 
00290    value = 0;
00291    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00292       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00293 
00294       AD0INT = 0;
00295       AD0BUSY = 1;
00296       while (!AD0INT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00297 
00298       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00299 
00300       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00301       yield();
00302    }
00303 
00304    value >>= 6;
00305 
00306    if (channel < 2)
00307       gvalue = value / 65536.0 * 20 - 10; // +- 10V range
00308    else
00309       gvalue = value / 65536.0 * 10; // 0...10V range
00310 
00311    gvalue += user_data.aofs[channel];
00312 
00313    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00314    *d = gvalue;
00315    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00316 }
00317 
00318 /*---- Shift register read function --------------------------------*/
00319 
00320 bit b0, b1, b2, b3;
00321 
00322 #define SHIFT SRCLK = 1; delay_us(1); SRCLK = 0; delay_us(1)
00323 
00324 void sr_read()
00325 {
00326    SRCLK = 0;
00327    SRIN = 1;
00328    SRSTROBE = 1;
00329    delay_us(1);
00330    SRSTROBE = 0;
00331 
00332    user_data.din[2] = SRIN;
00333    SHIFT;
00334    user_data.din[3] = SRIN;
00335    SHIFT;
00336    user_data.din[0] = SRIN;
00337    SHIFT;
00338    user_data.din[1] = SRIN;
00339 
00340    SHIFT;
00341    b3 = SRIN;
00342    SHIFT;
00343    b2 = SRIN;
00344    SHIFT;
00345    b1 = SRIN;
00346    SHIFT;
00347    b0 = SRIN;
00348 }
00349 
00350 /*---- Application display -----------------------------------------*/
00351 
00352 unsigned char application_display(bit init)
00353 {
00354 static bit b0_old = 0, b1_old = 0, b2_old = 0, b3_old = 0;
00355 
00356    if (init)
00357       lcd_clear();
00358 
00359    /* display first two ADCs */
00360    lcd_goto(0, 0);
00361    printf("0:%6.3fV", user_data.adc[0]);
00362    lcd_goto(10, 0);
00363    printf("1:%6.3fV", user_data.adc[1]);
00364 
00365    /* show state of relais 0&1 */
00366    lcd_goto(0, 1);
00367    printf("Rel0: %s", user_data.relais[0] ? "ON " : "OFF");
00368    lcd_goto(10, 1);
00369    printf("Rel1: %s", user_data.relais[1] ? "ON " : "OFF");
00370 
00371    /* toggle relais 0 with button 1 */
00372    if (b1 && !b1_old) {
00373       user_data.relais[0] = !user_data.relais[0];
00374       user_write(0);
00375    }
00376 
00377    /* toggle relais 1 with button 3 */
00378    if (b3 && !b3_old) {
00379       user_data.relais[1] = !user_data.relais[1];
00380       user_write(1);
00381    }
00382 
00383    /* enter menu on button 0 or 2 */
00384    if (!init)
00385       if ((b0 && !b0_old) || (b2 && !b2_old))
00386          return 1;
00387 
00388    b0_old = b0;
00389    b1_old = b1;
00390    b2_old = b2;
00391    b3_old = b3;
00392 
00393    return 0;
00394 }
00395 
00396 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00397 
00398 unsigned char uart1_send(char *buffer, int size);
00399 
00400 void user_loop(void)
00401 {
00402    static unsigned char adc_chn = 0;
00403  
00404    /* read one ADC channel */
00405    adc_read(adc_chn, &user_data.adc[adc_chn]);
00406    adc_chn = (adc_chn + 1) % 8;
00407 
00408    /* read buttons and digital input */
00409    sr_read();
00410 
00411    /* mangae menu on LCD display */
00412    lcd_menu();
00413 }
